Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory47.jpg'}
{3: 'Bridge of Babylonia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'The jumper is set! Can we transfer the signal?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Not yet. There must be an issue with the power.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '****! Looks like we have to move the batteries here ourselves!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'll get Team Two!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Hurry! The power will disconnect in fifteen minutes!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory259.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'All anti-interference protocols are dismissed. There is not enough computational power to counteract this unexpected occurrence.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Unexpected o-occurrence o-occurrence o-occur...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee charges at "Bianca"" with all his strength and lands a flying kick, causing ""Bianca" to lose balance.'}
{3: 'Then, using his right hand as an axis, he does a spinning kick with both feet, sending "Bianca" flying toward Lucia—'}
{3: '—Right into her unsheathed blade.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia slashes "Bianca," giving her no time to react.'}
{3: 'The left shoulder of "Bianca" separates along the edge of the blade, sending parts flying and disintegrating in the air.'}
{3: 'Lucia follows her attack with a swift kick, sending "Bianca" flying.'}
{3: 'As "Bianca" flies through the air, a beam of light hits her right in the face.'}
{2: 'Well done, Liv.', 3: '42'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I just... got the shot off... in time...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The fragmented body of "Bianca" separates into three as they fall among the ruins of buildings devastated during the battle.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory260.png'}
{3: 'Lucia takes the left, Lee takes the right, and Liv comes in from the middle, shielding you, as you four carefully move in a pincer formation toward the largest part of "Bianca."'}
{3: 'The camouflage on her fragmented body has almost disappeared, any resemblance of Bianca completely disintegrated, leaving a peculiar shape behind.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...Asimov hasn't told us that the issue is resolved, so this must be the sub-terminal Huaxu specifically used to block us. Looks like Huaxu is still causing Babylonia to fall from somewhere else.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I remember that... During the battle of Kowloong, Gabriel took Huaxu's key from Qu.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "So the Ascendants are behind this, then. Huaxu wouldn't be issuing this attack on Babylonia otherwise.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "AI is restricted by security protocols. They can't execute such dangerous orders without first receiving them from an operator.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Frame functionality... d-disassembling d-disassembling...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'C-cannot c-cannot... c-cannot maintain target restrictions...', 4: '1'}
{3: '—You sense a wave of energy fluctuations—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...What's going on? My body... keeps...", 4: '2'}
{3: '—The jamming signal from the unknown origin disappears—'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The elevator switch... is turned on...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The vibration slowly comes to stop after a while, and everyone gradually regains their bodily functions.'}
{3: '—At which point, the rest of you finally notice Liv pointing off into the distance.'}
{3: 'Following her hand, everyone sees "Authorization Restriction Revoked" displayed on the operation panel to the passageway.'}
{2: "Let's get going, everyone.", 3: '78'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory47.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: 'Type Two fuel batteries have arrived!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct B', 3: 'Type Four fuel batteries have arrived!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "What the hell are you doing! You can't mix two different transformers! If the bridge blows up, I'm not footing the bill!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Connect the jumper and crank up the voltage!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Are you crazy?! If you blow up the immersion chamber, you'll sever all the power!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "We can't wait! Five more minutes and the voltage will go below the red line!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Forget it... Don't worry about it!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "If it blows up, it blows up! If it can last for another minute, that's still a minute longer!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory277.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'The area infiltrated by the sub-terminals is in danger. Calling all sub-terminals to provide protection.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "What's happening?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'They found the access point and the location of the sub-terminal.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...But you said everything was under control.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I miscalculated the capabilities of Gray Raven. It appears that their maneuver and strength have improved since the battle in Kowloong.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...Is the database outdated?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'It seems highly likely.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Hmph... Are you hiding something from me, Huaxu?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I cannot understand what you are implying.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...I have more important things to do than explain myself to you.', 4: '1'}
